review: Don't travel without it! don't live without it!
author: kevin reed

review: when I ordered it, I was under the impression there would be many free movies and tv shows to choose from.  It turns out that most have to be rented or purchased, even with Amazon Prime.  Quite disappointed.
author: mental health counselor "mstgmama"

review: Just received new Fire stick awesome!!!
author: raha

review: love my new Fire Stick! Endless movies and music!
author: Angel

review: I am a fan of Chromecast but I love how the firestick works! It turns any TV into a smart TV with its on screen menus. No need to have a phone or tablet to operate like with Chromecast.
author: T&V.R.;

review: I have to reboot almost every time I sign in.  It looses connection with my wifi.  Also, I love to watch Acorn TV, but you can't access it thru the fire stick or even my Wii.
author: Marilyn J De Paula

review: This is the best, easiest way to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime!!
author: Kathleen Conway "KKC"

review: Stops working!!! I've had it for about a few weeks and got about a few weeks of play out of it. Now it's not coming on. I've taken the fire stick from the tv several times and re-inserted it and it's not working.And I paid full price! Not happy, Amazon.....not happy.
author: Cd LcRobinson

review: Thanks super fast shipping,nice products thanks again amazon
author: juan dominguez
